name: stelace-stripe
description: Stelace server wrapper plugin for Stripe
author: Stelace (https://stelace.com)

scripts.test:server: cross-env STELACE_PLUGINS_PATHS=$(shx pwd) npm explore stelace-server -- yarn test:server
scripts.test:ci: cross-env STELACE_PLUGINS_PATHS=$(shx pwd) NODE_ENV=test ava --c 1 --tap | tap-xunit
scripts.test:ci:server: cross-env STELACE_PLUGINS_PATHS=$(shx pwd) npm explore stelace-server -- yarn test:ci:server
scripts.plugins:server: shx cp .env ./node_modules/stelace-server/.env && cross-env STELACE_PLUGINS_PATHS=$(shx pwd) npm explore stelace-server -- yarn plugins
